@(serviceName: String, packageName: String, methods: Vector[play.grpc.gen.scaladsl.GrpcMethodInfo])

// Generated by Play gRPC Gateway. Add your implementation here.

package @packageName

import play.api.mvc.Result
import play.api.mvc._

import javax.inject.Inject

import scala.concurrent.{ExecutionContext, Future}

class @{serviceName}ControllerImpl @@Inject()()(implicit ec: ExecutionContext) {
@for(e <- methods) {
  def @{e.name} (@{e.inputType}): Future[Result] = Future  {
    val r: @{e.outputType} = ???
    Results.Ok(r.toProtoString)
  }
}
}
